subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Harvick, Nascar’s defending champion, earned his first career victory at Las Vegas Motor Speedway and his first Sprint Cup win of the season.
snippet: Harvick, Nascar’s defending champion, earned his first career victory at Las Vegas Motor Speedway and his first Sprint Cup win of the season.
